casebody.data:
MAGDALENA DOSCHER et al.; Plaintiffs and Respondents, v. JOHN J. SHAW et al., Defendants and Appellants.

Before Monell, Curtis, and Sedgwick, JJ.

Decided June 29, 1872. Appeal from a judgment in favor of plaintiffs upon an agreement of defendants as sureties upon a lease. Sterling <& Walden, for appellants. Man & Parsons, for respondents. Judgment affirmed, with costs.

No opinion delivered.
